isis.stitle: International® DT 466E, DT 466, 530, 530E, and HT 530 Diesel Engines - Cylinder Head and Valves - Remove - Fuel Injector Wiring Harness

svcproc.title: Fuel Injector Wiring Harness

warning.para: To avoid serious personal injury, possible death, or damage to the engine or vehicle, read all safety instructions in the "Safety Information" section of this manual.

To avoid serious personal injury, possible death, or damage to the engine or vehicle, make sure the transmission is in neutral, parking brake is set, and wheels are blocked before doing diagnostic or service procedures on engine or vehicle.

svcproc.para:
Once valve cover and intake manifold and gasket have been removed, identify fuel injectors and solenoid connectors. Place Cylinder Head Magnetic Intake Shield (PS94-831-1)
over intake ports of cylinder head to prevent any small loose parts, dirt or debris from falling in power cylinder.

figure.caption: Fuel injector and cylinder head magnetic intake shield

caution.para: To avoid possible damage to the engine or vehicle, do not pull on wires.

step1.para: Locate solenoid wire bail connector at each fuel injector. Pull back on each connector wire bail.
Pull down on connectors to disconnect wiring harness from fuel injectors.
Remove wiring harness and oil deflector assembly hold down bolts.

calloutgroup.callout1: Wiring harness and oil deflector assembly

step1.para: Remove wiring harness and oil deflector assembly.

figure.caption: Remove wiring harness and oil deflector assembly

item.para: Release wire bail on injector harness connector and remove connector.

Release top snap of fuel injector harness clip by applying a slight force in each directions indicated by arrows. Once top snap is free, release bottom snap by pushing against side of oil deflector in direction shown.
Slide harness clip away from fuel injector toward cam side of engine.
